name: anandi
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitr3i(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w0), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w0, w0), w0)

|- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wa(w0, w0), wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wa(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w0, w2)))

comment: Distribution of conjunction over conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1995.)
